keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working with local organisations and businesses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Colin McGavigan will work constructively with local businesses, the Council and development agencies to help create the right climate to grow the economy of South Lanarkshire and create and sustain jobs for local people.
Access to good quality NHS services is a top priority for Colin and he will campaign both to protect existing frontline services and to expand community-based health care locally.
Colin shares the concerns of local people over crime and anti-social behaviour and will press for a tougher approach to be taken towards those who break the law and who cause trouble on our streets.

issues.economy: Colin McGavigan will work to grow the economy of South Lanarkshire and create and sustain jobs.
issues.health: Colin will campaign to protect existing NHS services and expand community-based health care.

images.caption: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR COLIN MCGAVIGAN

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on environmentally friendly paper from sustainable forests.
